div.a: N. H. PILATE MIDDLE SCHOOL RESOURCES

span.style: font-family: Bitter;

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/CDlNeHCh00zUr_CasbQ5bKYeuGehN49zL_l8WuEr1llpI9UA2PjIfbqh1xdpmCYu7fiBY6AFJw=w16383);

h2.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Mississippi State Board of Education to Meet Virtually on March 26

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.span: The Mississippi State Board of Education (SBE) will hold a special-called virtual meeting at 10 a.m. Thursday, March 26, to consider policy waivers for promotion and graduation and recommendations to manage the effects of the statewide school closure. We know you have questions on next steps on policy decisions. MDE is working to address policy questions and will present information to the SBE. You may view the meeting via livestream at

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.h3: On Thursday, March 19, 2020, MHSAA canceled all athletic events and practices through April 17, 2020.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.h3: Starting on Monday, March 23, 2020, NMSD will ONLY serve free Grab 'N Go Breakfast and Lunch at Newton Elementary and Newton High for children who are able to visit our neighborhood schools. However, no eating is allowed on campus.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.h3: Also starting on March 23, 2020, NMSD buses will begin running mobile feeding routes. Please click the bus below for times and locations.

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/hdH56WA52CwheC20h1QNSJN6bjfTvXsqKnd2AnRwE5eDsAY-VZ6IO3QGSaCJk3fXub5bcFv5=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/afahYmQ-h4qbp4Lp7xvVyxsDSt4oezKddvu7RDoCNcrDl1sCDlxy77oGDNzXxjvBru-2awNugw=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.span: In accordance with Governor Tate Reeves’

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.span: as a result of the COVID-19 impact. All school facilities will remain closed to the public until further notice. However, the NMSD faculty and staff are working to provide printed resource packets as well as web-based instructional resources which will be available at

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.span: next week. Please check the website for updates.

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/hfNuxBBA7lWqp-OQDYUGjeCppwzZ4C_Qx3wvNTHhY2CnSTlfpPF4NyP08HkMkf4-dIE-lSLi=w16383);

span.style: font-family: Playfair Display; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.small: The Newton Municipal School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, religion, marital status, disability, or age in its programs and activities. Inquiries should be directed to the Newton Municipal School District Title IX Coordinator @ 601 683 2451 and/or the Newton Municipal School District 504 Coordinator @ 601 683 3275.
